item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, January 14, 2025 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Google’s OAuth login doesn’t protect against purchasing a failed startup domain (148 points | 79 comments)
2. Apple will soon receive 'made in America' chips from TSMC's Arizona fab (67 points | 18 comments)
3. Dbt Labs acquires SDF Labs (35 points | 22 comments)
4. Reversible computing escapes the lab (121 points | 25 comments)
5. 1 in 5 online job postings are either fake or never filled, study finds (234 points | 187 comments)
6. Proton: We're giving away over $1M to support a better internet (125 points | 34 comments)
7. Allstate used GasBuddy and other apps to track driving behavior (91 points | 78 comments)
8. Snyk security researcher deploys malicious NPM packages targeting cursor.com (531 points | 264 comments)
9. Making an Intersection Unsafe for Pedestrians to Save Seconds for Drivers (256 points | 338 comments)
10. In the Belly of the MrBeast (341 points | 243 comments)
11. Carnarvon's NASA satellite dish receives first signal in almost 40 years (64 points | 15 comments)
12. Craniometrix (YC W22) Is Hiring Founding Engineer on CTO Track ( | hide)
13. Using Coding Skills to Make Passive Income (147 points | 72 comments)
14. A couple CSS tricks for HTML Dialog elements (68 points | 17 comments)
15. GNU Shepherd 1.0.0 Released (35 points | 5 comments)
16. Webtop – Alpine,Ubuntu,Fedora,and Arch containers containing full desktop envs (290 points | 55 comments)
17. LLM based agents as Dungeon Masters (59 points | 68 comments)
18. I Switched to Firefox and Never Looked Back (463 points | 370 comments)
19. Executive Order on Advancing United States Leadership in AI Infrastructure (7 points | 1 comment)
20. NASA to explore two landing options for returning samples from Mars (19 points | 5 comments)
21. Shavarsh Karapetyan (156 points | 22 comments)
22. Lines of code that beat A/B testing (2012) (359 points | 152 comments)
23. Robinhood to Pay $45M SEC Settlement over Data Breach, Other Violations (72 points | 11 comments)
24. Company of One: Why Staying Small Is the Next Big Thing for Business (22 points | 7 comments)
25. X-ray flashes from nearby supermassive black hole accelerate mysteriously (69 points | 3 comments)
26. Voyage-code-3 (101 points | 27 comments)
27. A secure distributed actor language (72 points | 26 comments)
28. Servo vs. steppers: Speed, Torque and Accuracy [video] (46 points | 7 comments)
29. Dragonfly's extreme loop-the-loops (114 points | 40 comments)
30. How we used GPT-4o for image detection with 350 similar illustrations (198 points | 82 comments)
